title: Compare causes of French and Russian Revs

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Compare and contrast the crises in state authority that precipitated the French Revolution in 1789 and the February and October Revolutions in Russia in 1917.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
